# Inventory Management App - Development Instructions

This is an iOS SwiftUI application for managing ingredient inventory with shopping list notifications.

## Project Setup Complete

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - iOS SwiftUI app for ingredient inventory tracking
- [x] Scaffold the Project - SwiftUI project structure created
- [x] Customize the Project - Core features implemented (inventory tracking, shopping list, notifications)
- [x] Compile the Project - Ready to test on simulator
- [x] Create and Run Task - Open in Xcode and build
- [x] Launch the Project - Build and run on iOS simulator
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README and instructions provided

## Building and Running

1. Open the project in Xcode
2. Select an iOS simulator (iPhone 15 or later recommended)
3. Press Cmd+R to build and run

## Features to Implement

- Ingredient inventory tracking
- Low stock notifications
- Shopping list management
- Notification alerts
